panel.title: Getting new data from FRED
panel.html:
The FRED Add-On has a form for managing the default series list, but there is also a form to search and manage the list in this application.
Just click default-->FRED Default List in the application menu, as shown below.
The default list management view is then displayed, as shown below.
List items can then be added, deleted, and changed. The information in the list comes from the FRED website at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/. Each FRED series at the site will have the information required to add to the list. A sample FRED series page is showm below with the list information called out.
